results.prompt: Create a Blueprint that prints 'Hello World' when the game starts.
results.output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_HelloWorld
PARENT: Actor

GRAPH: EventGraph

NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: PrintString [InString="Hello World"]

EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute

results.prompt: Create a Blueprint that destroys itself on begin play.
results.output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_SelfDestroy
PARENT: Actor

GRAPH: EventGraph

NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: DestroyActor

EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute

results.prompt: Make an Actor Blueprint that prints 'Game Over' at the start.
results.output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_GameOver
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: PrintString [InString="Game Over"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute

results.prompt: Create a Blueprint for an actor that rotates continuously on the yaw axis.
results.output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_RotatingYaw
PARENT: Actor

GRAPH: EventGraph

NODE n1: Event_Tick
NODE n2: GetWorldDeltaSeconds
NODE n3: MultiplyFloat [B=0.25]
NODE n4: MakeRotator [Yaw=1.0]
NODE n5: AddActorLocalRotation

EXEC n1.Then -> n5.Execute

DATA n1.DeltaSeconds -> n3.A [Float]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Yaw [Float]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.DeltaRotation [Rotator]

results.prompt: Create a Blueprint that toggles a light on and off when the player presses E.
results.output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_ToggleLight
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_InputAction [ActionName="Toggle"]
NODE n2: PrintString [InString="Toggle activated"]
NODE n3: ToggleVisibility
EXEC n1.Pressed -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.Then -> n3.Execute
errors: Too few EXEC connections: got 2, expected >= 3

results.prompt: Create a Blueprint that prints a message when a player overlaps with it.
results.output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_OverlapTrigger
PARENT: Actor

GRAPH: EventGraph

NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: CastToCharacter
NODE n3: PrintString [InString="Player Entered"]

EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n3.Execute

DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Object [Actor]

results.prompt: Create a health pickup that adds 25 health on overlap and then destroys itself.
results.output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_HealthPickup
PARENT: Actor
CATEGORY: Pickups

GRAPH: EventGraph

NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: CastToCharacter
NODE n3: GetVar [Variable=CurrentHealth]
NODE n4: AddFloat [B=25]
NODE n5: SetVar [Variable=CurrentHealth]
NODE n6: PlaySound [Sound=PickupSound]
NODE n7: DestroyActor

EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n3.Execute
EXEC n3.Then -> n4.Execute
EXEC n4.Then -> n5.Execute
EXEC n5.Then -> n6.Execute
EXEC n6.Then -> n7.Execute

DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Object [Actor]
DATA n3.Value -> n4.A [Float]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.Value [Float]

results.prompt: Create a health system with 100 max HP that checks if health reaches zero and destroys the actor.
results.output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_HealthSystem
PARENT: Actor
CATEGORY: Gameplay

VAR CurrentHealth: Float = 100
VAR MaxHealth: Float = 100

GRAPH: EventGraph

NODE n1: Event AnyDamage
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=CurrentHealth]
NODE n3: SubtractFloat [B=0]
NODE n4: ClampFloat [Min=0.0, Max=100]
NODE n5: VariableSet [VarName=CurrentHealth]
NODE n6: LessEqualFloat [B=0.0]
NODE n7: Branch
NODE n8: DestroyActor
NODE n9: PrintString [InString="Damage Taken"]

EXEC n1.Then -> n5.Execute
EXEC n5.Then -> n7.Execute
EXEC n7.True -> n8.Execute
EXEC n7.False -> n9.Execute

DATA n2.Value -> n3.A [Float]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Value [Float]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.Value [Float]
DATA n5.Value -> n6.A [Float]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.Condition [Bool]

results.prompt: Create a Blueprint with a timer that prints 'Tick' every 2 seconds.
results.output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_TimerPrint
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: SetTimerByFunctionName [FunctionName="OnTimer", Time=2.0, Looping=true]
NODE n3: Event_CustomEvent [EventName="OnTimer"]
NODE n4: PrintString [InString="Tick"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n3.Then -> n4.Execute

results.prompt: Create a door that opens when a player presses E within 200 units. The door should rotate 90 degrees on the yaw axis.
results.output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_Door
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_InputAction [ActionName="Open"]
NODE n2: PrintString [InString="Open activated"]
NODE n3: GetPlayerPawn
NODE n4: GetDistanceTo
NODE n5: LessThan [B=200.0]
NODE n6: Branch
NODE n7: AddActorLocalRotation [DeltaRotation=(Pitch=0,Yaw=90,Roll=0)]
EXEC n1.Pressed -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.Then -> n6.Execute
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.OtherActor [Actor]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.A [Float]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n6.True -> n7.Execute

results.prompt: Create a coin pickup Blueprint that adds 1 to a coin counter, plays a sound, and destroys itself when a player overlaps.
results.output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_Coin
PARENT: Actor
CATEGORY: Pickups

GRAPH: EventGraph

NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: CastToCharacter
NODE n3: GetVar [Variable=CoinCounter]
NODE n4: AddFloat [B=1.0]
NODE n5: SetVar [Variable=CoinCounter]
NODE n6: PlaySoundAtLocation [Sound=PickupSound]
NODE n7: DestroyActor

EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n3.Execute
EXEC n3.Then -> n4.Execute
EXEC n4.Then -> n5.Execute
EXEC n5.Then -> n6.Execute
EXEC n6.Then -> n7.Execute

DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Object [Actor]
DATA n3.Value -> n4.A [Float]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.Value [Float]
